resources.string: To calibrate the app you must set out a lane of 20m and complete it at different speeds(Walk, Jog, Run). When your ready press the relevant button, you will be alerted when the test will begin. When you reach the end of the lane you must press stop. Repeat for the 3 speeds.
Press start and jump as high as you can. The best of three attempts is recorded.

Welcome to sportstracker. This app is designed to help you monitor your progress after each training session. Please log onto www.sportstracker.com to view all your results.
For information on each test please navigate through the pages.\n
Enjoy your training!

Vertical jumps are used to both train and test for power output in athletes. This test will ask you to perform three jumps. First you must attach the mobile to just above your ankle. (An armband is a good way) Press start and the test will begin. When 3 jumps are done you will be able to save you best jump.
Press start to start recording. When you are finished press save and your route will be saved to the database

Layout a 25 metre lane with a cone at 5 metre intervals. When you are prompted run to the first cone, back to the start, run to the second cone, back to the start and so on until the timer sounds. If each interval is completed they will have run a total distance of 150 metres. The goal is to complete all intervals in 30 seconds.

Set a lane with whatever distance you require. Press the start button. A pop up box will appear asking you how many laps you want to do. e.g.100m lane by 10 laps is a total of 1km. Press start when finished.The app will recored your time for each lap and display it when you finish. A button will then pop up to save your data.
To upload all your information to the website you must press the sync button. You must have an internet connection to do this. This will upload all your results to the website.
